description: Creates/deletes an issue in a Taiga Project Management Platform

status.description: The issue status. Must exist previously.

priority.description: The issue priority. Must exist previously.

severity.description: The issue severity. Must exist previously.

tags.description: A lists of tags to be assigned to the issue.

project.description: Name of the project containing the issue. Must exist previously.

taiga_host.description: The hostname of the Taiga instance.

state.description: Whether the issue should be present or not.

attachment.description: Path to a file to be attached to the issue.

issue_type.description: The issue type. Must exist previously.

attachment_description.description: A string describing the file to be attached to the issue.
